QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, fin_burden_levels.id odf_pk, fin_burden_levels.APPLIED_AT as applied_at, fin_burden_levels.FLAT_AMOUNT as flat_amount, matrix_id.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, matrix_id.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, fin_burden_levels.MATRIX_ID as matrix_id, fin_burden_levels.BURDENING_LEVEL as burdening_level, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, fin_burden_levels.RATE_TYPE as rate_type, matrix_id.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, fin_burden_levels.BURDENING_CLASS as burdening_class, (SELECT CURRENCY_CODE FROM FIN_BURDEN_MATRICES WHERE ID = MATRIX_ID) as matrix_currency_code, fin_burden_levels.PERCENTAGE as percentage, fin_burden_levels.BURDENING_FORMULA as burdening_formula, fin_burden_levels.ESCALATION_PERCENT as escalation_percent, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, FIN_BURDEN_LEVELS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_burdeninglevel.partition_code as partition_code, FIN_BURDEN_LEVELS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, fin_burden_levels.ESCALATION_AMOUNT as escalation_amount, matrix_id.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from fin_burden_levels fin_burden_levels JOIN odf_ca_burdeninglevel odf_ca_burdeninglevel ON odf_ca_burdeninglevel.id=fin_burden_levels.id JOIN (select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, fin_burden_matrices.id odf_pk, odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from fin_burden_matrices fin_burden_matrices JOIN odf_ca_burdeningmatrix odf_ca_burdeningmatrix ON odf_ca_burdeningmatrix.id=fin_burden_matrices.id where 1 = 1 ) matrix_id ON matrix_id.odf_pk=fin_burden_levels.MATRIX_ID , SRM_RESOURCES created, SRM_RESOURCES updated where FIN_BURDEN_LEVELS.CREATED_BY = created.USER_ID AND FIN_BURDEN_LEVELS.LAST_UPDATED_BY = updated.USER_ID
